original_text:
You went to Molek with olive oil
    and increased your perfumes.
You sent your ambassadors far away;
    you descended to the very realm of the dead!
korean_text: 네가 기름을 가지고 몰렉에게 나아가되 향품을 더하였으며 네가 또 사신을 먼 곳에 보내고 스올에까지 내려가게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: You went to Molek with olive oil
You sent your ambassadors far away
you descended to the very realm of the dead
